remarks: Subgroup sum is an upper bound of its arguments.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Feb-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2016.)
statement:
lsmless2.v $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
lsmless2.s $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` G ) $.
lsmub2x $p |- ( ( T e. ( SubMnd ` G ) /\ U C_ B ) -> U C_ ( T .(+) U ) ) $.
